name:
LEGO® STAR WARS™: THE
FORCE AWAKENS - Update
formal_name:
LEGO® STAR WARS™: THE
FORCE AWAKENS - Update
description:
Patch which will take LEGO STAR WARS: The Force Awakens to v1.1.0 and contains a number of fixes throughout the game.

• Fixed a crash on the character customizer due to a memory leak.

• Fixed a crash that could potentially occur when opening the Galaxy Map

• Fixed an issue that could prevent the user from continuing play if they paused the game immediately after exiting from a freeplay mission.

• Several rare memory crashes throughout the game addressed.

• Fixed being unable to use the touch screen to change vehicles in flight sections.

• Fixed an issue that could occur when rapidly swapping character that caused the “MISSING STRING” text to occur.

• Updated credits.
